outputs.output_descr: This project will achieve: (1) consensus on the trans boundary diagnostic analysis; (2) strategic action program; (3) collaborative agreement with relevant regional and sub-regional organizations; (4) Strengthened SSME tri-com for the SCS and its Sub-com on sustainable fishers; (5) strengthening of existing national inter-ministerial committees for effective implementation of the agreed action programs for SCS; (6) establishment of one demonstration site and another replication site for each country; (7) integrated coastal management(ICM) plans for fisheries management, prepared and implemented at each demonstration site and initiated at each replication site; (8)establishment of new/strengthening of existing local inter-sectorial committees for effective implementation of local ICM plans; (9) better understanding of stocks of small pelagic fisheries; (10)per capita income at demonstration sites increased by 10 percent; (11) disseminated knowledge, lessons and practices.

project_descr: Sulu Celebes Seas Sustainable Fisheries Management
project_title: Sulu Celebes Seas Sustainable Fisheries Management
